segments.text: I see a little girl standing near the boy, looking up at him expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her arm is raised towards the cookie jar, palm open, as if she's waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so hopeful, like she really wants one of those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she knows how dangerous it is for the boy to be standing on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems to be cooperating with him, maybe helping him get the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she doesn't encourage him to do something reckless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her posture is attentive, like she's really focused on getting that cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the boy handing her a cookie, and she looks so pleased.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they both know they're not supposed to be taking those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns around soon and catches them before someone gets hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR
